top_banner.title: FESTIVAL PASSES 2024
top_banner.description: Passes are exclusively sold online, no passes will be available for sale at the entrance.
top_banner.description1: Passes to Tanweer Festival can be purchased for 1 day or 3 days.
top_banner.description2: All passes include full day access to the entire festival including music performances, workshops and sessions, Marketplace, Food Court and Art Installations.
top_banner.description3: Add a camping experience to any pass to experience the nature of the beautiful Mleiha desert while staying close to all the festivities.

festival_passes.title: General Admission
festival_passes.caption: FESTIVAL PASS
festival_passes.description: Three days of music, creativity, and endless inspiration.
points: 3-day access to the festival
30+ live performances to fill your day with music, rhythm, and energy
Creative expression sessions in calligraphy, illumination, and sacred geometry design
Breathwork, Sufi whirling, and handpan workshops
Art tours and installations that inspire wonder
Organic food to fuel the vibe
A marketplace with handcrafted products, instruments, and sustainable goods
Amenities and facilities
The best part: three days with an amazing community of like-minded people.

festival_passes.title: Mleiha Bracelet
festival_passes.caption: FESTIVAL PASS
festival_passes.description: Three days of music, creativity, and endless inspiration.
points: All benefits of the festival pass plus:
Shurooq Lounge access, including F&B and refreshments
Reserved parking
Access to the premium seating of the main stage, first come, first serve
Access to Mleiha Archaeological Centre
Moon gazing experience

festival_passes.title: General Admission
festival_passes.caption: Together Pass
festival_passes.description: BRING A FRIEND AND DOUBLE THE EXPERIENCE, A festival experience is better shared. This pass gives you and a partner access to three days of music, creativity, and unforgettable moments.
points: Access to all three days of the festival for two people.
30+ live performances, workshops, and sessions specified in the agenda.
Twice the fun in creative sessions like calligraphy, illumination, and sacred geometry design.
Breathwork, Sufi whirling, and handpan workshops.
Art tours and installations that inspire wonder.
Organic food to fuel the vibe.
A marketplace with handcrafted products, instruments, and sustainable goods
Amenities and facilities
Most importantly, three days with someone who vibes with you and other awesome humans.

day_passes.caption: day PASS
day_passes.description: A full day of music, creativity, and all the good vibes you can handle.
points: One-day access to the festival
Live performances to fill your day with music, rhythm, and energy (specified in the schedule)
Creative expression sessions in calligraphy, illumination, and sacred geometry design

last_paragraph: Explore our Stay & Activities page to enrich your experience at Tanweer Festival, ensuring every moment is infused with meaning and inspiration.
